Typealiases.html#/s:8Succinct15UIViewEva.name: UIViewEvaluator
Typealiases.html#/s:8Succinct15UIViewEva.abstract: Definition for a closure that takes a UIView as an argument in order to evaluates it against some kind of condition. If a UIView object that satisfies this conditio is found, then that UIView object is returned.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: hasMapView()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for an MKMapView object.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: findMapView()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for an MKMapView object.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: loadViewControllerForUnitTest()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: tapBarButtonItem(withSystemItem:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the view controller’s navigationItem.leftBarButtonItems, navigationItem.rightBarButtonItems, as well as the UIView hierarchy for a UIToolbar which may contain a UIBarButtonItem whose SystemItem matches the searchSystemItem and then attempts to tap the UIBarButtonItem by firing its associated target event, if one exists.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: tapBarButtonItem(withTitle:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the view controller’s navigationItem.leftBarButtonItems, navigationItem.rightBarButtonItems which may contain a UIBarButtonItem whose Title matches the searchTitle and then attempts to tap the UIBarButtonItem by firing its associated target event, if one exists.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: tapLeftBarButtonItem()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Attempts to tap the view controller’s navigationItem.leftBarButtonItem UIBarButtonItem object regardless of what it is (so long as one exists) by firing its associated target event, if one exists.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: tapRightBarButtonItem()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Attempts to tap the view controller’s navigationItem.rightBarButtonItem UIBarButtonItem object regardless of what it is (so long as one exists) by firing its associated target event, if one exists.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: hasButton(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIButton whose title for UIControl.State.normal matches the searchText exactly.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: findButton(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIButton whose title for UIControl.State.normal matches the searchText exactly.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: tapButton(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIButton whose title for UIControl.State.normal matches the searchText exactly and then attempts to tap the button by sending a .touchUpInside event to it.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: hasButton(withImage:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIButton whose image for UIControl.State.normal matches the searchImage.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: findButton(withImage:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIButton whose image for UIControl.State.normal matches the searchImage.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: tapButton(withImage:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIButton whose image for UIControl.State.normal matches the searchImage and then attempts to tap the button by sending a .touchUpInside event to it.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: findButtons(withState:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for all UIButton objects whose state matches the indicated state.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: hasDatePickerView()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIDatePicker object.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: findDatePickerView()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIDatePicker object.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: hasImageView(withImage:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIImageView object whose image matches the provided search image.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: findImageView(withImage:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIImageView object whose image matches the provided search image.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: countOfImages(_:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for all UIImageView objects whose image matches the provided search image.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: hasLabel(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UILabel whose text matches the searchText exactly.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: hasLabel(containingText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UILabel whose text contains the searchText.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: findLabel(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UILabel whose text matches the searchText exactly.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: findLabel(containingText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UILabel whose text contains the searchText.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: hasPickerView()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for any UIPickerView.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: findPickerView()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for any UIPickerView.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: selectPickerRow(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for any UIPickerView. If a UIPickerView is found, then it will attempt to search the title text for all rows of all columns for the specified search text. If a row title matching the search text is found, then that row will be selected.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: selectPickerRow(columnIndex:withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for any UIPickerView. If a UIPickerView is found, then it will attempt to search the title text for each row of the indicated column index for the specified search text. If a row title matching the search text is found, then that row will be selected.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: hasPickerRow(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for any UIPickerView. If a UIPickerView is found, then it will attempt to search the title text for all rows of all columns for the specified search text.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: hasSelectedPickerRow(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for any UIPickerView. If a UIPickerView is found, then it will attempt to search the title text for only the selected row of each column for the specified search text.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for all UISwitch objects whose isOn property matches the provided value.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: findSwitch(containedInView:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UISwitch that is contained in a view of type viewType.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: findSwitch(colocatedWithUILabelWithExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UISwitch that is contained in a view where a UILabel also exists whose text property matches the provided search text.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: tapSwitch(containedInView:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UISwitch that is contained in a view of type viewType. If a UISwitch is found that matches this criteria, then it is tapped to fire its target touchUpInside event.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: tapSwitch(colocatedWithUILabelWithExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UISwitch that is contained in a view where a UILabel also exists whose text property matches the provided search text. If a UISwitch is found that matches this criteria, then it is tapped to fire its target touchUpInside event.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: findSelectedTableViewCell()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for any UITableView objects to determine if there is a selected UITableViewCell within that UITableView.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: tapCell(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for any UITableView objects to attempt to tap on the cell that contains a label with the prodivded searchText.

Extensions/UITableView.html#/c:@CM@Succi.name: findView(satisfyingCondition:)
Extensions/UITableView.html#/c:@CM@Succi.abstract: Searches through all rows of all sections as well as all header views within a UITableView for a view that satisfies the passed in condition.

Extensions/UITabBarController.html#/c:@C.name: selectTab(withExactTitle:)
Extensions/UITabBarController.html#/c:@C.abstract: Attempts to select a tab in a UITabBarController whose UITabBarItem title property matches the searchTitle text.

Extensions/UITabBarController.html#/s:So.name: selectedTab(isAKindOf:)
Extensions/UITabBarController.html#/s:So.abstract: Checks if the UITabBarController’s selectedViewController property matches the type passed in.

Extensions/UISwitch.html#/c:@CM@Succinct.name: isOff
Extensions/UISwitch.html#/c:@CM@Succinct.abstract: Convenience property which indicates if the UISwitch is off. This can be helpful when writing assertions as opposed to testing the isOn property.

Extensions/UISwitch.html#/c:@CM@Succinct.name: tapAndFireTargetEvent()
Extensions/UISwitch.html#/c:@CM@Succinct.abstract: Simulates tapping a UISwitch control by sending the .touchUpInside event action. Since simply sending the action does not change the state of the UISwitch, this method also flips the isOn property to simulate the effect tapping the switch would actually have.

Extensions/UIPickerView.html#/c:@CM@Succ.name: selectRow(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIPickerView.html#/c:@CM@Succ.abstract: Loops through all components (columns) of a UIPickerView and searches the title text for each row of the current column for the specified search text. If a row title matching the search text is found, then that row will be selected.

Extensions/UIPickerView.html#/c:@CM@Succ.name: selectRow(columnIndex:withExactText:)
Extensions/UIPickerView.html#/c:@CM@Succ.abstract: Loops through only the specified component (column) of a UIPickerView and searches the title text for each row for the specified search text. If a row title matching the search text is found, then that row will be selected.

Extensions/UIPickerView.html#/c:@CM@Succ.name: hasRow(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIPickerView.html#/c:@CM@Succ.abstract: Loops through all components (columns) of a UIPickerView and searches the title text for each row of each component (column) for the specified search text.

Extensions/UIPickerView.html#/c:@CM@Succ.name: hasSelectedRow(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIPickerView.html#/c:@CM@Succ.abstract: Loops through all components (columns) of a UIPickerView and searches the title text only for the selected row of each component (column) for the specified search text.

Extensions/UIControl.html#/c:@CM@Succinc.name: isDisabled
Extensions/UIControl.html#/c:@CM@Succinc.abstract: Convenience method which indicates if the control is disabled or not. This can be helpful when writing assertions as opposed to testing the isEnabled property.

Extensions/UIButton.html#/c:@CM@Succinct.name: tapAndFireTargetEvent()
Extensions/UIButton.html#/c:@CM@Succinct.abstract: Simulates tapping a UIButton control by sending the .touchUpInside event action.

Extensions/UIBarButtonItem.html#/s:So15U.name: systemItem
Extensions/UIBarButtonItem.html#/s:So15U.abstract: Convenience property for accessing the SystemItem for this UIBarButtonItem, if one has been set.

Extensions/UIBarButtonItem.html#/c:@CM@S.name: tap()
Extensions/UIBarButtonItem.html#/c:@CM@S.abstract: Attempts to tap this UIBarButtonItem object by firing its associated target event, if one exists.

Extensions/Optional.html#/s:Sq8SuccinctE.name: isNil()
Extensions/Optional.html#/s:Sq8SuccinctE.abstract: Convenience method to check if the current optional value is nil.

Extensions/Optional.html#/s:Sq8SuccinctE.name: isNotNil()
Extensions/Optional.html#/s:Sq8SuccinctE.abstract: Convenience method to check if the current optional value is not nil.

Classes/SuccinctConfig.html#/c:@M@Succin.name: enableDebugLog()
Classes/SuccinctConfig.html#/c:@M@Succin.abstract: Calling this function will turn debug logging on for all of Succinct.

Classes/SuccinctConfig.html#/c:@M@Succin.name: disableDebugLog()
Classes/SuccinctConfig.html#/c:@M@Succin.abstract: Calling this function will turn debug logging off for all of Succinct.

Classes/Succinct.html#/s:8SuccinctAAC6co.name: config
Classes/Succinct.html#/s:8SuccinctAAC6co.abstract: Object which allows access to cofigurable options within Succinct.

Classes/Succinct.html.name: Succinct
Classes/Succinct.html.abstract: Primary object for access to Succinct configurable options.

Classes/SuccinctConfig.html.name: SuccinctConfig
Classes/SuccinctConfig.html.abstract: Object which allows access to cofigurable options within Succinct.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
